item.title: AI or Not raises $5M to stop AI fraud, deepfakes and misinformation
item.description: AI or Not, an AI fraud detection platform, has raised $5 million in a seed funding round to accelerate its use of "AI to detect AI" in images.

item.title: Dizzaract Games launches in Abu Dhabi as Middle East’s largest game studio
item.description: Dizzaract Games has officially launched as the largest game development studio in the Middle East.

item.title: Microsoft just built an AI that designs materials for the future: Here’s how it works
item.description: Microsoft researchers unveil MatterGen, which accelerates scientific discovery 15X and doubles success rates for stable compounds.

item.title: Enterprises can now run real-time data through Google Cloud’s most advanced VMs
item.description: Early adopters like Couchbase are already seeing significant price-performance gains with Google Cloud's new VMs.

item.title: You can now fine-tune your own version of AI image maker Flux with just 5 images
item.description: Whether for brand-consistent marketing visuals or detailed character art, the Flux Pro Finetuning API enhances precision and adaptability.
